'''''Need for Saurian Speed''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all 3 [[Warrior's Challenge]]s in [[Atocpan]] with a grade of SS.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The challenges can be started by talking to [[Urubamba]], [[Ma'chah]], and [[Runa]], respectively.
** To unlock Urubamba's challenge, the player must first complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Little Lost Saurians]]''.
** To unlock Ma'chah's challenge, the player must first complete the {{Quest|Is "Intensity" Really the Key?}}.
